erodingstoneentities-fabric.duskconfig.D: The duration in seconds after a stone-type item entity in the world erodes to sand if it's in a water stream.

If enabled, prevents the erosion of stone blocks if the item entity is above an ice block. Useful for when you use water streams to transport items you don't want to have eroded, just place ice underneath the streams.
erodingstoneentities-fabric.duskconfig.p: Prevent Erosion If Above Ice Block
erodingstoneentities-fabric.duskconfig.D: If enabled, the items specified in 'itemsWhichErodeIntoClay' will erode into a clay block instead of the default clay ball.
erodingstoneentities-fabric.duskconfig.e: Erode Into Clay Block Instead Of Clay Ball
erodingstoneentities-fabric.duskconfig.D: The items which erode into normal sand when left in flowing water. Divided by a comma.
The items which erode into red sand when left in flowing water. Divided by a comma.
erodingstoneentities-fabric.duskconfig.i: Items Which Erode Into Red Sand
erodingstoneentities-fabric.duskconfig.D: The items which erode into clay balls when left in flowing water. Divided by a comma.
